pages.text: $(li)Crabs can be found in $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/beach)Beaches$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/quark/crab_legs)Crab Legs$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/quark/crab_shell)Crab Shells$(/l) upon death.$(br)$(li)Crabs can be bred with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/wheat)Wheat$(/l), Raw Chicken, or any kind of fish.
$(li)If a near $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/jukebox)Jukebox$(/l) it is playing a music disc near a Crab, it will start dancing to the rhythm of the music.
